level.heading: Required medium.
level.text: If a law of the District of Columbia requires that a sworn declaration be presented in a particular medium, an unsworn declaration shall be presented in that medium.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-191
level.text: For Law 18-191, see notes following ยง 16-5301.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 5 of the Uniform Unsworn Foreign Declarations Act.
